findings.title: Unrelated Units Comparison
findings.description: The `_relayInterest()` function requires the balance of the bridge to be greater than the relayed interest, which are unrelated units and should not be compared.

findings.title: Incorrect Conditional Statement in payInterest() Function
findings.description: In the payInterest() function, the second if clause should be (balance + interest > minCash) to prevent zero withdrawal.

findings.title: Unnecessary Storage Access
findings.description: The refillBridge() function reads `minCashThreshold` variable value from storage twice.
